# Geoviewer 
GeoViewer is a real-time Twitter feed App capturing the local ground truth in specific areas with powerful geovisualization / mapping functions. It features

  - showing the real-time tweets in the specific areas
  - using instagram-like interface to show real-time tweets
  - providing multiple mapping fucntions, such as marker, cluster, and heatmap, to visualize the tweets
  - providing various queries, such as keyword, time, and location search
  - integrating popular GIS base maps and GIS layers

### Version
2.2

### Tech

GeoViewer uses a number of open source projects to work properly:

Server: 
* [node.js] - evented I/O Web server
* [Express] - fast node.js network app framework 

Client:
* [jQuery] - 
* [Twitter Bootstrap] - great UI boilerplate for modern web apps
* [leaflet] - Leaflet API
